content:
Can you provide a detailed JSON representation of a virtual reality world that is set in the future? The world should include:
- A 3D representation of the environment
- Interactive objects and characters within the world
- Audio and visual effects that enhance the user experience
- Any specific rules or limitations within the world
- A storyline or purpose for the user to follow
The JSON format should be easily readable and editable for future development of the virtual reality world.
